name: Stay Awayke
description:
This game is a solo project and was made in 3.5 hours as a part of Trijam #152. The theme was 'Leave me alone!'

Disclaimer: This is currently balanced toward someone with approx 50-60 wpm typing speed. I hope to add speed options in the future!

Assets used:
Heartbeat sound
Help Me' Font by GGBot

Some features I may implement in the future:
Impactful typing visual effects/animations
Sound improvements
Difficulty selection for varying typing speeds

Thanks for taking the time to check this game out. Please let me know your thoughts in the comments! :)
